data.title: 1GB, 2GB No lag config
data.desc1: Phone memory refers to RAM (Random Access Memory). RAM is the part of the phone that is used to store the operating system (OS) and where apps and data currently in use are kept. Whereas, phone storage is used to store data such as apps, photos, videos, and files that are necessary for the phone to run. RAM is a lot faster than phone storage but you don't have as much of it.
data.desc2: FF does not run smoothly on Low RAM devices. Minimum 2GB RAM is required for gameplay. Using developer options in settings of Device disable animation, background activities can help to rum game smoothly. No worries if you have below 2GB ram devices you can enjoy game fully by configuring the setting of your device. Automatic working configuration file is available on many websites. You can generate file link and use it freely.

data.title: Glitch VIP Skins
data.desc1: VIP Skins are premium and requires money to buy. It may cost you lots of money to get even a single VIP skin.
data.desc2: Only we will see the VIP Skin but other don't so, we can enjoy vip skins for free. You can generate file link and use it freely.

data.title: Legendary Clothes
data.desc1: Legendary clothes pack requires money to buy. It may cost you lots of money to get even a single legendary cloth
data.desc2: Only we will see the Legendary Cloth but other don't so, we can enjoy legendary cloth for free. You can generate file link and use it freely.

data.title: Config Pack 1
data.desc1: Various configurations makes gameplay more fun. All the popular configs that are packed together is now available in market. Some are working and some are not working. You need to try it to find out if it is right file or wrong file.
data.desc2: Only we will see the Skin and emotes but other don't so, we can enjoy rich game feeling for free. You can generate file link and use it freely.
